articles.author: Mathieu Pollet
articles.title: ‘Significant number’ of North Korean troops in Kursk, Zelenskyy says - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Ukrainian president says Moscow is deploying North Korean soldiers on the Kursk front line and could extend their use to other areas.
articles.content: "The Russians include them in combined units and use them in operations in the Kursk region," Zelenskyy said. He also pointed to "information suggesting their use could extend to other parts of the f… [+551 chars]
